title: feat: OpenClaw integration â€” landing page, setup script, docs
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: OpenClaw meets Pollinations
gist.blurb: We've rolled out the red carpet for OpenClaw users! A new landing page and setup script make it effortless to power your agents with our hive of models.
gist.summary: Introduces a dedicated landing page and setup script to easily configure Pollinations as the primary model provider for OpenClaw agents.
gist.impact: OpenClaw users can now instantly access models like Kimi, Gemini, and Claude via Pollinations with a single command.
gist.visual_concept: A collaboration scene featuring the Pollinations Bee and a cute pixel art Crab (representing OpenClaw). They are working together in a cozy digital garden, connecting a glowing lime green cable or sharing a data scroll.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot and a cute 8-bit crab character connecting a glowing lime green (#ecf874) data cable. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. The crab looks happy. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
